reviewText:
These two volumns show pretty and interesting amature porn performers competing for a porn contract and prize money.  Amatures are put through a series of tests or games and their performances are judged by a panel of professional porn stars and an agent.  It's a fun watch and the Dr. Ava segments present brief sexual info and tips.

However, not much is offered in the way of direct sexual instruction, but this one is not a "how to" tape.  Sadly, there's no explicit nudity (basic T&A) either, and the strip scenes are tame, but the comments by judges Amber and Ginger Lynn are absolutely on the mark!  These ladies are insightful, respectful and honest! Buy this (if you haven't seen it on pay-for-view) and see what it takes to become a porn starlett!
